fulltext: c251fb3ad00c11e1a404080027e73ea2948a7fff88164e4ab581ea35197bb8c4;2018-11-15T16:39:41Z;toolService;toolService:tool;MBT â Memory-Based Tagger-Generator and Tagger;MBT is a memory-based tagger-generator and tagger in one. The tagger-generator part can generate a sequence tagger on the basis of a training set of tagged sequences; the tagger part can tag new sequences. MBT can, for instance, be used to generate part-of-speech taggers or chunkers for natural language processing. It has also been used for named-entity recognition, information extraction in domain-specific texts, and disfluency chunking in transcribed speech.;2012-07-17
name: aa15b056-be30-58e1-b137-c1e2a040f3af
notes: MBT is a memory-based tagger-generator and tagger in one. The tagger-generator part can generate a sequence tagger on the basis of a training set of tagged sequences; the tagger part can tag new sequences. MBT can, for instance, be used to generate part-of-speech taggers or chunkers for natural language processing. It has also been used for named-entity recognition, information extraction in domain-specific texts, and disfluency chunking in transcribed speech.
title: MBT â Memory-Based Tagger-Generator and Tagger
